--- alter_table_set_on_delete_no_action.sql
alter table foo set on delete no action
--- AST
&parser.AlterTable{
  pos:  0,
  Name: &parser.Ident{
    pos:  12,
    end:  15,
    Name: "foo",
  },
  TableAlternation: &parser.SetOnDelete{
    pos:      16,
    end:      39,
    OnDelete: "ON DELETE NO ACTION",
  },
}

--- SQL
ALTER TABLE foo SET ON DELETE NO ACTION
